sentence.text: Cytochrome P450 3A5 (lipid hydroxylation) metabolizes these compounds in tumors of the exocrine-like subtype, and pharmacological or short hairpin RNA (shRNA)-mediated lipid hydroxylation inhibition sensitizes tumor cells to these drugs.
These findings designate lipid hydroxylation as a predictor of therapy response and as a tumor cell-autonomous detoxification mechanism that must be overcome to prevent drug resistance
